edu.csulb.cecs277

Class Coupon

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csulb.cecs277.Coupon

  • public class Coupon
extends java.lang.Object
    this class models a coupon object with a given item to which it can be applied and a percentage amount discount
    Since:
    2019-02-12
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Katherine Varela

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Coupon()
      Constructs an invalid coupon with no discount
      Coupon(java.lang.String item, double discount)
      creates a coupon with type of item it is applicable to, and a percent discount

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      gets the discount of this coupon

      Returns the itemType String of the coupon
      boolean isValid()
      Returns if the coupon is a valid coupon
      java.lang.String toString()
      returns a string representation of this coupon that reads 'This coupon is valid for % off any time.'
